Source.Contents:
record FpML5.transparency.ConvertibleBond {
  # Identification of the underlying asset, using public and/or private identifiers.
  instrumentId : string?

  # Trading currency of the underlyer when transacted as a cash instrument.
  currency : string?

  # Identification of the exchange on which this asset is transacted for the purposes of calculating a contractural payoff. The term "Exchange" is assumed to have the meaning as defined in the ISDA 2002 Equity Derivatives Definitions.
  exchangeId : string?

  # Identification of the clearance system associated with the transaction exchange.
  clearanceSystem : string?

  # An optional reference to a full FpML product that defines the simple product in greater detail. In case of inconsistency between the terms of the simple product and those of the detailed definition, the values in the simple product override those in the detailed definition.
  definition : FpML5.transparency.ProductReference?

  issuerName : string

  issuerPartyReference : FpML5.transparency.PartyReference

  # The repayment precedence of a debt instrument.
  seniority : string?

  # Specifies if the bond has a variable coupon, step-up/down coupon or a zero-coupon.
  couponType : string?

  # Specifies the coupon rate (expressed in percentage) of a fixed income security or convertible bond.
  couponRate : decimal?

  # The date when the principal amount of a security becomes due and payable.
  maturity : date?

  # Specifies the nominal amount of a fixed income security or convertible bond.
  parValue : decimal?

  # Specifies the total amount of the issue. Corresponds to the par value multiplied by the number of issued security.
  faceAmount : decimal?

  # Specifies the frequency at which the bond pays, e.g. 6M.
  paymentFrequency : FpML5.transparency.Period?

  # The day count basis for the bond.
  dayCountFraction : string?

  # Specifies the equity in which the convertible bond can be converted.
  underlyingEquity : FpML5.transparency.EquityAsset?

  # Earlier date between the convertible bond put dates and its maturity date.
  redemptionDate : date?

  id : string?

}

instrumentId.Doc: Identification of the underlying asset, using public and/or private identifiers.
instrumentId.Name: instrumentId

currency.Doc: Trading currency of the underlyer when transacted as a cash instrument.
currency.Name: currency

exchangeId.Doc: Identification of the exchange on which this asset is transacted for the purposes of calculating a contractural payoff. The term "Exchange" is assumed to have the meaning as defined in the ISDA 2002 Equity Derivatives Definitions.

clearanceSystem.Doc: Identification of the clearance system associated with the transaction exchange.
clearanceSystem.Name: clearanceSystem

definition.Name: definition

seniority.Doc: The repayment precedence of a debt instrument.
seniority.Name: seniority

couponType.Doc: Specifies if the bond has a variable coupon, step-up/down coupon or a zero-coupon.
couponType.Name: couponType

couponRate.Doc: Specifies the coupon rate (expressed in percentage) of a fixed income security or convertible bond.
couponRate.Name: couponRate

maturity.Doc: The date when the principal amount of a security becomes due and payable.
maturity.Name: maturity

parValue.Doc: Specifies the nominal amount of a fixed income security or convertible bond.
parValue.Name: parValue

faceAmount.Doc: Specifies the total amount of the issue. Corresponds to the par value multiplied by the number of issued security.
faceAmount.Name: faceAmount

paymentFrequency.Doc: Specifies the frequency at which the bond pays, e.g. 6M.
paymentFrequency.Name: paymentFrequency

dayCountFraction.Doc: The day count basis for the bond.
dayCountFraction.Name: dayCountFraction

underlyingEquity.Doc: Specifies the equity in which the convertible bond can be converted.
underlyingEquity.Name: underlyingEquity

redemptionDate.Doc: Earlier date between the convertible bond put dates and its maturity date.
redemptionDate.Name: redemptionDate
